requirements.description: Customer's data collection and use practices can only be implemented if all necessary disclosures are made to, and consents and authorizations are obtained from, Customer's users.
Customer's data collection and use practices can only be implemented if they are necessary or appropriate for RevenueCat's performance of the Services.

RevenueCat's and Stripe's processing of personally identifiable information relating to users can only take place if Customer has made all necessary disclosures to, and obtained consents and authorizations from, its users.
Customer's privacy policy must disclose RevenueCat's and Stripe's processing of such information in a reasonable and industry-standard manner.
Customer must make all necessary disclosures in a reasonable and industry-standard manner.
